org.testng.reporters

Class TextReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testng.TestListenerAdapter
      • org.testng.reporters.TextReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationListener, IConfigurationListener2, IResultListener, IResultListener2, ITestListener, ITestNGListener

    public class TextReporter
extends TestListenerAdapter
    A simple reporter that collects the results and prints them on standard out.
